dev.eternalformula.api.ecs.components.interfaces

Interface TranslatableComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LightComponent, ParticleComponent, PhysicsComponent

    public interface TranslatableComponent
    The Translatable interface is an easy way for entities to update the positions of their components.
    Since:
    Alpha 0.0.4

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void translate(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 deltaPos)
      Translates the component by a specific amount.

    • Method Detail

      • translate

        void translate(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 deltaPos)
        Translates the component by a specific amount.
        Parameters:
        deltaPos - The amount to be translated.
